SALES ASSOCIATE
Professional Summary
Sales professional offering nearly 4 years experience in sales and sales management in a retail setting.
Specializes in men and women's wear, with emphasis in building a solid customer base.
Skill Highlights
High-end fashion knowledge Superb sales professional
Loss prevention comprehension Ability to mediate disputes
Listening skills
Reliable and punctual
Compelling leadership skills
Customer service oriented Cash handling accuracy Retail merchandising expertise
Excellent communication skills Energetic Bilingual in English and Spanish

ACHIEVEMENTS

Developed highly effective sales training strategies as Sales Manager.
Lead management team to exceed monthly store sales goal multiple times as Sales Manager.
Earned an achievement in Sales for Management, averaging 20% of the stores sales per month.
Lead several departments as the top salesperson by surpassing periodical goals Sold high end product & merchandise to elite celebrities and continued service beyond the store.

<JD_START>
Job Title: Senior Business Developer (Manufacturing/MRD)

Location: Minneapolis, MN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Want to learn more about this role and Jobot? Click our Jobot logo and follow our LinkedIn page!

Job details

A Thriving Practice Where Your Sales Expertise Meets Impact and Flexibility

This Jobot Job is hosted by Josh Nix

Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Easy Apply" button and sending us your resume.

Salary $140,000 - $185,000 per year

A Bit About Us

Join a forward-thinking advisory firm where your contribution is paramount, and your growth is our priority. We value each individual’s unique path, and we embrace flexibility, not just as a policy, but as a way of life. Our collaborative culture fosters a workspace where curiosity leads to innovation, relationships lead to results, and feedback is the cornerstone of our evolution.

We are in search of a Senior Sales Executive with a passion for the Manufacturing, Retail, and Distribution sectors. This role is designed for a visionary who is both a relationship architect and a strategic hunter, eager to explore new avenues in a dynamic marketplace.



Why join us?


 A Culture of Inclusion An environment where every voice matters and diversity is embraced. Support for Your Journey A firm that's committed to providing the resources and support you need to thrive. Benefits to Support Your Well-being A range of benefits designed to cater to your health, well-being, and professional growth. Workplace Flexibility Opportunities for remote work and flexible scheduling to accommodate your personal work style. Path to Partner  Best in industry commission structure

Job Details

 New Business Conductor Lead the charge in securing new business opportunities, becoming the trusted advisor for potential clients and the representative face at industry events. Strategic Network Builder Develop deep-rooted relationships with key industry figures, positioning our suite of services as the first choice for any business challenge. Lead Generation Maverick Intelligently generate leads from a multitude of sources, following through with a combination of tact and tenacity. Marketing and Sales Integration Collaborate with marketing to nurture leads into solid opportunities, ensuring a seamless transition from initial interest to engagement.

Strategic Focus

 Market Insight Cultivation Craft a list of target companies within the Eastern US, understanding their needs and the competitive landscape. Alignment with Leadership Work hand-in-hand with industry leaders to align sales strategies with overarching business goals.

Requirements

 Educational Background A Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field—or equivalent experience. Industry Acumen 5-10 years of proven sales experience in the MRD sector. Intangible Sales Expertise A track record of selling services and crafting value propositions. Client Relationship Mastery Demonstrable success in initiating and growing client relationships. CRM Command Adept at leveraging CRM systems to oversee pipelines and track performance.

Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Easy Apply" button.

Want to learn more about this role and Jobot?

Click our Jobot logo and follow our LinkedIn page!

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
<JD_END>
